message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your position, Bob, but $7,500 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7,500 and $9,000. How about $8,250?
